text:
My wish for each
and every one of you

today is that you
begin a journey that

will be a transformational
journey for each
and every one of you.

What is this experience
going to be like?
Will you like it here?
Will you excel?
Will you make friends?
Will you fall in love?
It's a serious possibility!

This is the time to truly
find what your passion is.

Because if you can
find your passion,
success is so much easier.
Look around you.

This is a more diverse
class in more ways
than you might imagine.
I'm from Syria, Damascus.
Monterrey, Mexico.
Hometown, Cincinnati, Ohio.
Germany.

I lived the last
two years in Russia.

I've been in Silicon
Valley for six years.

I am an electrical engineer
with a Medical Anatomy Degree.

Originally from
Paramus, New Jersey.

We will also take you to
different parts of the world.

To make the most of
this, though, you

have to get out of the
comfort zone of hanging out

with the people that
are most like you.

Tell me, what is it you
plan to do with your one
wild and precious life.

Leadership is about what gives
you the self-confidence to say,

I know in what way I
want to be a leader.
What motivates me?

But it is also
about having others

have the experience that
they want to be lead by you.
This is a place of leadership.
And you're the aspiring leaders.

Welcome to Harvard
Business School.
